title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.5 - Construction work
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.5 - Construction work

State Regulations

Construction work of any kind or work incidental thereto is
prohibited within the parkway system unless authorized under a written
agreement or contract with the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
